FROM gcr.io/oss-fuzz-base/base-builder
MAINTAINER lebedev.ri@gmail.com
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y cmake make && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/darktable-org/rawspeed.git librawspeed
WORKDIR librawspeed
COPY build.sh $SRC/
